modName: New Skin And Hair Colors Without Replacing Texture
summary: New skins and Hair without texture Replacement
descriptionHtml:
This tutorial is designed to give your charachter new skintones and new hair colors without having to replace any textures its very easy and u can do it while playing the game no programs required what so ever.

Big thanks to all the support I\'ve had with my previous mods because of it i created this tutorial so you guys can make do it too.

All the work i do is for others and were all requested by others same with this file
This was requested by: Voraxith

thankyou and i hope you guys enjoy this.

Latest Version: 2
Updates Include step by step guide for both male & female

Credits to
Voraxith: for requesting this
chaos915: for reminding me i forgot to include a female guide
author: LoverBR
